revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.8.5, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]] or have [[Starf]] Berries growing in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.015% boost). =Details= {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location/Method !! Chance (no Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm) !! Chance (Lv 5 Shiny Charm and Full Starf Farm) |- | [[Regions|Route Encounter]] || 1 / 8192 || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2823 |- | [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] Encounter || 1 / 4096 || 1 / 2048 || 1 / 1412 |- | [[Evolution Items|Evolution Stone/Item use]] || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 2048 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 2 | 1 / 706 |- | [[Safari Zone]] Encounter |- | [[Pokemon Day Care|Hatching an Egg]] || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 1024 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 512 || rowspan = 3 | 1 / 353 |- | [[Berries#Wandering Pokémon|Farm Wanderer]] |- | [[Shops|Purchased Shopmon]] |- |} =Farm Shiny Breeding Strategy= [[Pokemon Day Care|Breeding]] is the most effective way to obtain most Shiny [[Pokémon]]. The [[Farm]] can be used to increase both the Egg Steps gained by defeating a Pokémon (thus hatching eggs faster) and the Shiny Rate in general. Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Furthermore, a [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] has been created for more specific calculations of Shiny Rates. ===Optimal Strategy Rank Table=== ''All calculations for Rank Table done [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kyQIpahGezv8tYYeQDoZMHjw6cVyGr7FD4MlXgbPr68/edit?usp=sharing here]'' Note: the Efficiency Rank does not consider growth time for berries. The table assumes perfect planting, where berries are planted not at the same time, but are planted so all plants are in the berry stage at the same time. {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Berry Type !! Full Strategy !! Max Egg Steps
Boost Multiplier !! Max Shiny
Boost Multiplier !! Efficiency Rank
(1 = best) !! Buff Duration !! Max Replant Time !! Uptime % !! Max Egg Steps * Buff/(Max Replant)
Boost Multiplier !! Max Shiny * Buff/(Max Replant)

|| {{ #expr: ((10/0.7)/((10/0.7) + (10/0.7))) * (1.56-1) + 1}} || {{ #expr: ((10/0.7)/((10/0.7) + (10/0.7))) * (1.00-1) + 1}} |- | [[Pokemon Day Care#Chople + Yache/Haban|Chople + Haban]] 12)/((4*24 + 12) + 24)) * (1.25-1) + 1round2}} |- |} ====Starf Planting Formation==== Planting Starf Berries can increase the Shiny Rate of all Pokémon encounters, including hatched eggs. Mulch*Sprayduck |- | [[Starf]] || - || - || - |- | [[Petaya]] || - || - || - |- | [[Chople]] || 19 hours 59 minutes 59 seconds until ripe || 13 hours 19 mins 59 secs until ripe || 8 hours 53 mins 19 secs until ripe |} ====Starf + Lum Planting Formation==== Planting Starf berries near at least one Lum Berry increases the Shiny Rate of all Pokémon encounters including hatched eggs more than solely using Starf berries.
